com.digby.localpoint.sdk.core

Interface ILPLocation


  • public interface ILPLocation
    A location is an area of interest defined in the Location Marketing console.
    Since:
    1.0.0
    Version:
    1.1.0

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void checkIn()
      Performs a check-in on this location.
      String getBSSID()
      Returns the basic service set identification (BSSID) associated with this location.
      ILPGeopoint getCenter()
      Returns the geopoint at the center of this location.
      String getCode()
      Returns the externally defined unique identifier of this location.
      String getDescription()
      Returns a description of this location.
      ILPID getID()
      Returns the internal unique identifier of this location.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of this location.
      String getSSID()
      Returns the service set identification (SSID) associated with this location.
      Set<ILPTag> getTags()
      Returns the set of tags associated with this location.
      boolean isDeviceIn()
      Returns whether or not the device is currently in this location.

    • Method Detail

      • getBSSID

        String getBSSID()
        Returns the basic service set identification (BSSID) associated with this location.

        This method may return null if no BSSID is associated with this location.

        Returns:
        the basic service set identification (BSSID) associated with this location

      • getCenter

        ILPGeopoint getCenter()
        Returns the geopoint at the center of this location.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the geopoint at the center of this location

      • getDescription

        String getDescription()
        Returns a description of this location.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        a description of this location

      • getID

        ILPID getID()
        Returns the internal unique identifier of this location.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the internal unique identifier of this location

      • getCode

        String getCode()
        Returns the externally defined unique identifier of this location.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the externally defined unique identifier of this location

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of this location.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the name of this location

      • getSSID

        String getSSID()
        Returns the service set identification (SSID) associated with this location.

        This method may return null if no SSID is associated with this location.

        Returns:
        the service set identification (SSID) associated with this location

      • getTags

        Set<ILPTag> getTags()
        Returns the set of tags associated with this location.

        This method should never return null.

        Returns:
        the (possibly empty) set of tags associated with this location

      • checkIn

        void checkIn()
        Performs a check-in on this location.

        This method will check into this location with the Location Marketing server to see if there are any offers available.

      • isDeviceIn

        boolean isDeviceIn()
        Returns whether or not the device is currently in this location.
        Returns:
        true if the device is currently in this location according to the Location Marketing server; false otherwise
